title: Projects
text:
Here are selected academic and personal projects:


Applied k-means clustering to segment ports and support cruise strategy.



Built hierarchical clustering models and interpreted dendrogram structures.



Used Decision Trees, Monte Carlo, and LP modeling.



Built regression, classification, and PCA-based segmentation.



A research project analyzing scalable analytics systems for SMEs.
